verbose_text: Understanding both active and total TGF-beta levels simultaneously would provide us with further insight into how TGF-beta is involved in physiological and pathological conditions including chronic fibrotic disorders [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], heart failure [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR], and cancer progression [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
